name: Batida
preparation:
This blended cocktail proves there’s more to cachaça than just Caipirinhas.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “Funky Rum. Everything You Need to Know About the Booming Trend.”

Add all the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice, and blend until smooth.

Pour into a rocks glass over pebble ice.

Garnish with a pineapple leaf.
